title: Employment Information
body: Welcome to Sybocorp!  As of March 10, 2020, you are officially under contract with the Sybocorp Corporation. Exact details relating to your employment with us can be found in the digital contract that was sent to you shortly after you were hired. This message is simply a brief overview of that document, and will hopefully clear up any questions you have regarding your obligations to Sybocorp.  EMPLOYMENT RESTRICTIONS: While under contract with Sybocorp [until September 10, 2020] you are forbidden from entering into contractual agreements with ANY other corporation regarding your employment.

title: Contrato n22
body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

title: wtf are you kidding me?
body: Are you kidding me? Why don't you change your password?  The system is entirely compromised until you correct it.  You're the sysadmin, if you're this dumb the corporation is at risk.
